tool.name: Soprano Dipolar
tool.description: Extract and summarise dipolar couplings from structure files.
tool.command: #if $merge.merge: #for i, file in enumerate($merge.input): ln -s '$file' '$i'.magres && #end for #else: ln -s '$merge.input' input.magres && #end if soprano dipolar $merge.merge --symprec '$symprec' --precision '$precision' #if $isotopes: --isotopes '$isotopes' #end if #if $average_group: --average-group '$average_group' #end if #if $select_i: --select-i '$select_i' #end if #if $select_j: --select-j '$select_j' #end if #if $rss.rss: $rss.rss --cutoff '$rss.cutoff' #end if $isonuclear --query '$query' #if $sortby: --sortby '$sortby' #end if --sort-order '$sort_order' #if $include: --include '$include' #end if #if $exclude: --exclude '$exclude' #end if --output-format '$output_format' --output $output *.magres

param.label: Selection `i`
param.help: Selection string of subset of sites include. Format is comma separated list of sites, either identifying element (e.g. `C`), position (e.g. `C.1-3,H.1.2`) or label (e.g. `C1,H1a,H1b`).

param.label: Selection `j`
param.help: Selection string of subset of sites include. Format is comma separated list of sites, either identifying element (e.g. `C`), position (e.g. `C.1-3,H.1.2`) or label (e.g. `C1,H1a,H1b`).

param.label: Root Sum Square
param.help: Calculate the dipolar constant Root Sum Square (RSS) for each atom in a system (includes periodicity), or the dipolar couplings between pairs of atoms.

param.label: Root sum square cutoff
param.help: Cutoff for dipolar constant Root Sum Square (RSS) for each atom in a system (includes periodicity). Units are Angstrom.

param.label: Isonuclear
param.help: Include only dipolar interactions between atoms of the same type.

tool.help:
Usage: soprano dipolar seedname.{magres|cif|POSCAR|etc}
